Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

Default.Description: Gives the default value of the variable.
Default.Name: Default

List Var.Description: Specify a list of either a Simple or Compound Variable.
List Var.Name: List Var

Local.Description: The Local attribute is used in the context of the definition to set local value within the scope of that definition only.
Local.Name: Local

Persist.Description: Specifies whether the value of the variable can be persisted/retained across multiple tally instances or not.
Persist.Name: Persist

Repeat.Description: Specifies the name of the Collection based on which the variable assumes multiple vales in context of a multi-columnar report.
Repeat.Name: Repeat

Set Always.Description: It modifies the value of the variable immediately.
Set Always.Name: Set Always

System Name.Description: Specifies whether sysnames can be stored in the variable.
System Name.Name: System Name

Table.Description: This attribute overrides the default collection used in the variable.  This attribute is used locally in a report to override the default table for the variable.
Table.Name: Table

Type.Description: Specifies the type of the data held by the variable.

Parameters.Keywords: Aggregate, Amount, Date, DateTime, Due Date, Duration, FlagSet, Logical, Long, Number, NumSet, Quantity, Rate, Rate of Exchange, String, Sys Id, Time

Type.Name: Type

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use

Variable.Description: To specify a Simple or Compound Variable within a Variable Definition.
Variable.Name: Variable

Volatile.Description: Specifies whether the value of the variable can retained across multiple scopes.
Volatile.Name: Volatile
